speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from Stellar Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Mark, I'm doing alright. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm reaching out regarding your overdue account with City Credit. Can you please confirm your name for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Alex. I see here you have a balance of $500 due. Would you like to discuss payment options?

speaker: Customer
text: Wait, can you confirm the account number first? I want to make sure this is legit.

speaker: Agent
text: Sure! The account number is 123456. So how would you like to settle the balance?

speaker: Customer
text: That doesn’t sound right. I need more verification before I discuss payment.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your concern. I can provide more details about the debt once I verify your identity further.

speaker: Customer
text: Okay, how do we proceed with that?

speaker: Agent
text: Could you please confirm your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks, Alex. Now, about that payment, would you be able to settle the $500 today?

speaker: Customer
text: Not today, I need to check my records first.

speaker: Agent
text: Of course, take your time. Let us know when you're ready to discuss.
